settings.title: How to order and what happens after the order has been placed?
settings.content:
• After you have checked out by adding your favourite items in the cart, our system will deem it as pending and confirmation would be required by phone.
• The system will send out a code on your phone for confirmation and once you have confirmed the order, you will receive an email with invoice of your verified order and our team will start preparing your order to ship.
• Once your order is shipped, you will receive an email of your tracking order ID through which you can track your order status from our website.
• Upon successfully delivering your order, your order status will be changed to complete.
• If there is any issue with your order, you will be called or reached through Whatsapp to respond.
If we are to cancel your order, a detailed Whatsapp SMS/email will be sent informing and explaining the reason.
• If the order is above 10,000 pkr, advance payment will be required and order will be processed only when the advance payment is received.

settings.title: Can I cancel the order?
settings.content:
You can cancel the order if
your order status has not been updated to shipped.

Stealth fire reserves the right to cancel orders for
any reason.

settings.title: Which payment methods are accepted in the online shop?
settings.content:
Stealth fire offers

• cash on delivery
• bank deposits
• Online bank payments through debit/credit cards from Visa and MasterCard.

The team requests for the internet banking feature to
be activated on your cards.

settings.title: What are the delivery chargesfor orders from the online shop?
settings.content:
Free Shipping on orders which are above 3000.

200 charged on orders below Rs.3000.

If your order is placed before 5pm, your order will shipped the same day through our Registered Courier Services.

Please continue to see our policies as they are amended and updated after a period to give a better service and offer to our customers.

settings.title: How long will delivery take?
settings.content:
• If your order is placed before 5pm, your order will shipped the same day through our Registered Courier Services.
• Orders received after 5:00 pm will be dispatched the next day.
• Your order will take 4-6 working days to be delivered. Delivery time is between 4 to 7 working days (No delivery on Sundays).

• However delivery can take up to 7 working days during busy shopping season or our mega sales events.
• If you are based in Sialkot, order received before 5pm will be delivered the same day.
Rest of the Cities: Same day dispatch from Lahore Office, next day delivery by courier service (cash on delivery available on selected items, usually items less than 5KG).
• In the case of customer’s absence upon delivery, Stealth fire’s representative will reach for suitable time of delivery and other necessary instructions required by you to deliver the parcel successfully. The parcel can be dropped at neighbours or any other nearby place only upon receiving the payment.

settings.title: Do you have a store?
settings.content:
No.
In order to give you the best
possible prices, we remain an online brand.
